entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-12-17
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Workload installation failed: microsoft.android.sdk.windows::34.0.64 is not found in NuGet feeds https://api.nuget.org/v3/index.json" #19466
  • Double tap gesture NullReferenceException when navigating #19465
  • Views are not vertically centre when layout vertical layout option is set to centre #19464
  • [UITEst] Windows Controls Unpackaged occasionally crashes with IndexOutOfRangeException #19463
    Backlog

Closed

  • [UITesting] Add device logs are not published #19038
    .NET 8 SR2
  • [Testing] Matrix tests are failing consistency (sometimes) on CI #18735
    .NET 8 SR2

PullRequests

Merged

  • Save device logs when UI Tests fail #19085
    area/infrastructure 🏗️, area/testing, testing-flakiness

Updated

  • [macOS] Fix `GesturePlatformManager.CalculatePosition` when asked for a relative position #19371
    community ✨, area/gestures
  • [housekeeping] Automated PR to fix formatting errors #19454
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/infrastructure 🏗️
